mechanics.condition: A poison, poisonous creature, or disease is within 30 feet of the caster
mechanics.outcome: Caster senses the presence and location of the target

mechanics.trigger: When sensing a poison, poisonous creature, or disease
mechanics.condition: Caster is sensing the target's presence and location
mechanics.outcome: Caster identifies the specific kind of poison, poisonous creature, or disease

mechanics.condition: Barrier consists of 1 foot of stone OR 1 inch of common metal OR a thin sheet of lead OR 3 feet of wood OR 3 feet of dirt
mechanics.outcome: Spell is blocked (cannot sense beyond the barrier)

description_text: For the duration, you can sense the presence and location of poisons, poisonous creatures, and diseases within 30 feet of you. You also identify the kind of poison, poisonous creature, or disease in each case. The spell can penetrate most barriers, but it is blocked by 1 foot of stone, 1 inch of common metal, a thin sheet of lead, or 3 feet of wood or dirt.
